Text:
It's a shocker ! no doubt about that film, probably it's Tulip Joshi's debut film.very good film to up !
before seeing this i was not aware of that kind of so called social creatures exist in our country,specially in northern India.At the end of d movie,there was a special twist,i love to see it,the baby was born not a masculine child,she was a feminine.and it created d beginning of another circle.a must watch for every one,many thanks SIRJI once again.
a must watch, for all those people who think women's rights activists are exaggerating
